title: Although I thought I was using the password for my 3a it does'nt seem to work so how can I recover i
content:
I have contacted Google chat. In California? Unfortunately I misinterpreted a symbol which I thought meant "blocked" but I now realize means 'silent'.
I have sent a photograph to Rosey as she asked of my phone but is now not communicating further.
I simply need to recover as this is a completely new phone.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
